page.title: 19TRANSPORT
page.content: The A519 , a main road linking the Potteries with Newport and Telford, runs through the area and carries a great deal of heavy goods traffic. The small community is fairly well served for public transport during the working day, but it is difficult to get into Stafford in the evenings by public transport. There is a bus company,Happy Days Woodseaves Ltd.,located just outside the village, and buses run regularly to Stafford,Eccleshall,and Newport, and there is a limited service to Wolverhampton and Shrewsbury.
